00011 int SwarmActivity::last_id = 0;
00012 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00013 SwarmActivity::SwarmActivity() {
00014         nNodes = 0; N = 1;
00015         this->id = last_id++;
00016 }
00017 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 SwarmActivity::~SwarmActivity() {
00019         for (POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos;) {
00020                 int nid; Record* r;
00021                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00022                 delete r;
00023         }
00024 }
00025 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 SwarmActivity::SwarmActivity(CArray<INode*> &node) {
00027         this->id = last_id++; nNodes = 0; N = 1;
00028         for (int i=0; i< node.GetCount();i++)
00029         {
00030                 Record *r = new Record();
00031                 r->node = node[i]; r->u = 0; r->psi = 1; r->rho = 1;
00032                 rec.SetAt(node[i]->id, r);
00033         }
00034 }

00055 void SwarmActivity::Serialize(CArchive& ar) {
00056         if (ar.IsStoring())     {
00057                 ar << id << type << start << stop << p;
00058         }
00059         else {
00060                 ar >> id >> type >> start >> stop >> p;
00061         }
00062         rec.Serialize(ar);
00063         actors.Serialize(ar);
00064         events.Serialize(ar);
00065 }
00066 // --------------------- ICluster overrides ---------------------------------
00067 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 double SwarmActivity::Distance(INode *node) {
00069         double dist = 0, norm = 0;
00070         double FAR_DISTANCE = 10;
00071         for (   POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL; ) {
00072                 int nid; Record* r;
00073                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);  
00074                 // CAUTION: if epsilon is to high, can cause dist == 0 , subsequently setting T = 0 in the cluster
00075                 double EPSILON = 0;
00076                 double FUZZIFIER = 2;
00077                 if (nid != node->id && r->u > EPSILON ) {
00078                         double weight = pow(r->u, FUZZIFIER) * r->psi;
00079                         dist += weight * r->node->Distance(node) ;
00080                         norm += weight;
00081                 }
00082         }
00083         ASSERT(dist != 0);
00084         if (norm == 0)
00085                 return FAR_DISTANCE;
00086         else
00087                 return dist/norm;
00088 }
00089 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 void SwarmActivity::Add(INode *node) {
00091         nNodes++;
00092         Record *r;
00093         if (rec.Lookup(node->id, r)) {
00094                 r->u = 1;
00095         }
00096 }
